name.en: KB Home Defense Mier lokdoos F

The Gardena PowerMax ™ 42nd electric lawn mower is a powerful and easy-to-use electric lawn mower with Powerplus: the engine has a great ability, powerful transmission and a large drawing power for excellent, accurate and constant cutting results and optimal grass collection by the 50 L grass collector.

contentToString.en: The Gardena PowerMax ™ 42nd electric lawn mower is a powerful and easy-to-use electric lawn mower with Powerplus: the engine has a great ability, powerful transmission and a large drawing power for excellent, accurate and constant cutting results and optimal grass collection by the 50 L grass collector.

name.en: Total weed control with systemic action. Concentrated formula, for the control of more difficult weeds (buttercup, cultivated grass ...) and for larger surfaces. Destroys all weeds in the root. Sow and plant already possible after one week.

contentToString.en: Total weed control with systemic action. Concentrated formula, for the control of more difficult weeds (buttercup, cultivated grass ...) and for larger surfaces. Destroys all weeds in the root. Sow and plant already possible after one week.

name.en: Application with sprayer: fill the appliance halfway with water, add the prescribed dose, top up with water and mix. Apply evenly and drip.

contentToString.en: Application with sprayer: fill the appliance halfway with water, add the prescribed dose, top up with water and mix. Apply evenly and drip.

name.en: Application with brush (20 ml in 100 ml water): Against the regrowth of shoots.

contentToString.en: Application with brush (20 ml in 100 ml water): Against the regrowth of shoots.

name.en: Roundup Extra should be applied to green weeds, in growth or already developed. Treat on a day with mild weather (12-25 ° C) without rain, nor wind. Rain can reduce the effect within 4 to 6 hours after application. Preferably spray on a dry vegetation.

contentToString.en: Roundup Extra should be applied to green weeds, in growth or already developed. Treat on a day with mild weather (12-25 ° C) without rain, nor wind. Rain can reduce the effect within 4 to 6 hours after application. Preferably spray on a dry vegetation.

name.en: Maintenance treatment: 10-20 ml Roundup Extra - 2.5 L water - 50m²

contentToString.en: Maintenance treatment: 10-20 ml Roundup Extra - 2.5 L water - 50m²

name.en: Stubborn weed: 30-50 ml Roundup Extra - 2.5 L water - 50 m²

name.en: For a delicious dessert with fresh fruit, for example pieces of apple or red fruits. Only add water and fruit of your choice and bake the whole in the oven.

contentToString.en: For a delicious dessert with fresh fruit, for example pieces of apple or red fruits. Only add water and fruit of your choice and bake the whole in the oven.

name.en: Preheat the oven to 180 ° C. Peel the apples and cut the flesh into pieces. Stew them briefly in butter. Divide the pieces over a refractory dish and add some raisins if necessary. Put 200 g of mix in a bowl and add 15 ml of water. Mix with a fork until the water is completely absorbed. Then knead by hand for 1 minute into a dry dough that you can easily tumble. Add a little water if the dough is too dry or a little flour if the dough is too moist and knead new. Form clumps and crumble them over the apple pieces. Bake the crumble at 180 ° C for 20 to 30 minutes.

contentToString.en: Preheat the oven to 180 ° C. Peel the apples and cut the flesh into pieces. Stew them briefly in butter. Divide the pieces over a refractory dish and add some raisins if necessary. Put 200 g of mix in a bowl and add 15 ml of water. Mix with a fork until the water is completely absorbed. Then knead by hand for 1 minute into a dry dough that you can easily tumble. Add a little water if the dough is too dry or a little flour if the dough is too moist and knead new. Form clumps and crumble them over the apple pieces. Bake the crumble at 180 ° C for 20 to 30 minutes.

name.en: Push in the claws and release them. Place the box with the holes upwards at places where ants pass by. The ants collect the product and place it in the nest, which is completely destroyed in a few days (larvae and adults). In case of a strong presence of ants, place several boxes.

contentToString.en: Push in the claws and release them. Place the box with the holes upwards at places where ants pass by. The fertilizer in the potting soil ensures a good start-up thanks to a complete and balanced package of nutritional elements that is adapted to the needs of the plants.

name.en: Give your plant water for repotting. Carefully remove them from the pot and remove the soil without damaging the roots. The dried out leaves, dead roots and dry flower stalks must be removed.

name.en: The mix of yellow, orange, red shades makes these sunflowers particularly suitable as cut flowers. For applications in the border, a perk and in large pots.

contentToString.en: The mix of yellow, orange, red shades makes these sunflowers particularly suitable as cut flowers. For applications in the border, a perk and in large pots.

name.en: Sow indoors in a nursery container or in pots, 1-2 cm deep. Cover the jars with plastic or glass to keep the sowing soil moist until the emergence of the seed. After four weeks, plant the young plants at the destination. In the ground: thinly sow, lightly press the seeds and cover with a layer of fine earth of about 1-2 cm. Watering and after emergence, if necessary, thinning to 25 cm apart.

contentToString.en: Sow indoors in a nursery container or in pots, 1-2 cm deep. Cover the jars with plastic or glass to keep the sowing soil moist until the emergence of the seed. After four weeks, plant the young plants at the destination. In the ground: thinly sow, lightly press the seeds and cover with a layer of fine earth of about 1-2 cm. Watering and after emergence, if necessary, thinning to 25 cm apart.

name.en: Marigolds (Calendula) are very easy to grow on all grounds and bloom long and luxuriant. The mixture is composed of yellow and orange hues and gives an abundance of cut flowers.

contentToString.en: Marigolds (Calendula) are very easy to grow on all grounds and bloom long and luxuriant. The mixture is composed of yellow and orange hues and gives an abundance of cut flowers.

name.en: Sow in well-worked, finely raked and weed-free soil. Thinly sow and lightly press the seeds and cover with a layer of fine soil of about 1 cm. Watering and after emergence, if necessary, thinning to 15 cm apart. In the past, sow indoors and grow the young plants in pots.

contentToString.en: Sow in well-worked, finely raked and weed-free soil. Thinly sow and lightly press the seeds and cover with a layer of fine soil of about 1 cm. Watering and after emergence, if necessary, thinning to 15 cm apart. In the past, sow indoors and grow the young plants in pots.

name.en: The hose is automatically rolled up. The practical hose box is attached to the wall and can be swiveled 180 °. The hose can be pulled out with little effort and stopped at short intervals of up to 50 cm. The quality hose of 13 mm (½ '') provides a high water flow and optimum operation of the nozzle. With a short pull on the hose, the lock is released and the hose is automatically retracted by the roll-up without having to do anything else. Your hands remain clean.

contentToString.en: The hose is automatically rolled up. The practical hose box is attached to the wall and can be swiveled 180 °. The hose can be pulled out with little effort and stopped at short intervals of up to 50 cm. The quality hose of 13 mm (½ '') provides a high water flow and optimum operation of the nozzle. With a short pull on the hose, the lock is released and the hose is automatically retracted by the roll-up without having to do anything else. Your hands remain clean.

name.en: After use, the connecting hose can easily be attached to the drip stop to prevent water running out.

contentToString.en: After use, the connecting hose can easily be attached to the drip stop to prevent water running out.

name.en: The wall hose box is fully equipped with a 15-meter long quality hose, a 2-meter long connecting hose, a continuously adjustable garden sprayer (item no. 8114) and the required Original Gardena System components: three hose pieces (item 900, 901, 902) ), a standard hose coupling (item no 915) and a water stop (article number 913).

contentToString.en: The wall hose box is fully equipped with a 15-meter long quality hose, a 2-meter long connecting hose, a continuously adjustable garden sprayer (item no. 8114) and the required Original Gardena System components: three hose pieces (item 900, 901, 902) ), a standard hose coupling (item no 915) and a water stop (article number 913).
